column5: Had the day to myself since my son was with his mom so I figured it would be a good day to head out to the grand for a full day of fishing .. managed to hook into 6 of them .. biggest being 28" long and an even 12lbs according to my scale .. now I dont have a picture of the scale so if you don't believe the weight toooooo bad    took a little drive up the creek to Byng park .. just wanted to see what the water level was like up there .. pretty low and it looks like a beaver has decided to munch on a couple trees      going to head out again next weekend with the boy .. and the rod benders have a cat on the board
Nice pics! Hey what are you using to secure your trolling motor to the deck of the boat in transit? I want to do that as well.

12 LB cats are all muscle so ya i believe it was that heavy.  i find it funny that a beaver is smart enough to build a damn that takes either a bulldozer or dynamite to remove it, but are dumber then a fence post when it comes to selecting a tree that they cant move after spending all that time to knaw it down.
